channel.title: ASF Jira
channel.description: This file is an XML representation of an issue

item.title: [HIVE-19226] Extend storage-api to print timestamp values in UTC
item.description: Related to HIVE-12192. Create new method that prints values in UTC.
item.summary: Extend storage-api to print timestamp values in UTC

status.description: The issue is considered finished, the resolution is correct. Issues which are not closed can be reopened.

comments.comment: ashutoshc, Owen suggested in ORC-341 to create a boolean useUTC in TimestampColumnVector. Then, stringify would print the timestamp with UTC or system time zone depending on that boolean. It seems like a good idea, I will explore it and update this issue accordingly.

-1 overall
